s.text: Did Greenberg really have a great eye, or was Jackson Pollock just a lucky loser foisted on a gullible public by a bull in a china shop?
To illustrate their views, fraygrants posted lists of their favorite films in different genres, from the familiar to the obscure.

Not much common ground here; the battle continues.
"Black in America" erupted when an African-American fraygrant asked which white fraygrant would be the first to apologize to him for slavery.
